name: Dice Another Day
description:
• Move with arrows or wasd
  • q or e to rotate view
  • u to undo
If the game is horribly laggy, try this:
  • press i to reduce render resolution
  • press o to toggle post processing
  • press p to cycle quality levels
  • download the game instead (bonus: it also looks better)

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021

Theme: Roll of the Dice

3rd party assets
  • Jeans texture - cgbookcase.com
  • dice roll sound - SciFiSounds
  • Font: Quicksand by Andrew Paglinawan
